issue.title: [Go][Flight] Verify soruce nightly jobs are failing sqlite_server_test.go TestSqliteServer/TestCommandGetTablesWithIncludedSchemas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17496](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17496). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some of our verify-source nightly jobs as:
[verify-rc-source-go-linux-conda-latest-amd64](https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/7938975115?check_suite_focus=true)
[verify-rc-source-go-macos-amd64](https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/7938975115?check_suite_focus=true)
[verify-rc-source-integration-linux-conda-latest-amd64](https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/7939011008?check_suite_focus=true)
[verify-rc-source-integration-macos-amd64](https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/7939011734?check_suite_focus=true)
[verify-rc-source-integration-macos-conda-amd64](https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/7938978290?check_suite_focus=true)

failed with the following error:
```java

--- FAIL: TestSqliteServer (0.08s)
    --- FAIL: TestSqliteServer/TestCommandGetTablesWithIncludedSchemas (0.00s)
        sqlite_server_test.go:324:
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17496?focusedCommentId=17583030) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Well this is odd as hell, I can't reproduce myself. But it looks like the common thread is go1.17, which is slightly annoying given that the sqlite3 package says it supports go1.17. 

I'll dig into this a bit and possibly mark this test (and the example sqlite server itself) as only build with go1.18 if I need to.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17496?focusedCommentId=17583052) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
`[~raulcd]` I confirmed the issue is the `pragma_table_info` call when run in go1.17 vs go1.18. I've put up a PR marking the sqlite flightsql example in go to only build with go1.18 (we already have github actions CI runs that run using go1.18) which should solve the issue of the nightly builds that were using go1.17 here. I'll wait for the checks to complete and then merge it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17496?focusedCommentId=17583244) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13943
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13943>
